## ðŸ‘¨â€ðŸ’» About Me

I am a Full-Stack .NET Developer with **8+ years** of professional software engineering experience, including 3+ years focused on **enterprise backend and full-stack systems** using C# .NET, and 5 years of systems-level programming in C++.

I specialize in building business-critical, production-grade applicationsâ€”from backend APIs and data synchronization services to internal dashboards and mobile-backed systems. My work spans security access control, SAP-integrated workflows, financial systems, and real-time operational platforms.

I have hands-on experience designing and maintaining scalable backend architectures using .NET 6+, Entity Framework Core, SQL Server, PostgreSQL, REST APIs, and message-driven integrations, with strong attention to performance, reliability, and maintainability.

Prior to enterprise systems, I spent several years in systems and game development, working extensively with C++ physics engines and real-time systems, which shaped my engineering mindset around optimization, stability, and low-level understanding.

## ðŸŒŸ Featured Repositories

> Pinned repositories focus on **real-world backend patterns**, not tutorials.

- [![SingleScope](https://img.shields.io/badge/SingleScope-Arch%20Helpers-512bd4?style=flat&logo=data:image/png;base64,)](https://github.com/muhirwanto-dev/singlescope-plugins) [![NuGet](https://img.shields.io/nuget/v/SingleScope.Maui)](https://www.nuget.org/packages/SingleScope.Maui/) ![NuGet Downloads](https://img.shields.io/nuget/dt/SingleScope.Maui)  
A set of opinionated adapters and composition helpers that integrate best-in-class .NET libraries into consistent, production-ready application architectures.

- [![Scarecrow](https://img.shields.io/badge/Scarecrow-Template-blue?style=flat&logo=data:image/png;base64,)](https://github.com/muhirwanto-dev/scarecrow) [![NuGet](https://img.shields.io/nuget/v/Scarecrow.Api)](https://www.nuget.org/packages/Scarecrow.Api/) ![NuGet Downloads](https://img.shields.io/nuget/dt/Scarecrow.Api)    
A collection of opinionated .NET project templates designed to help you bootstrap modern applications using Clean Architecture, DDD, and best practices.
